description:
Thanks to Asterius joining the battle and Fels` revival magic, Wiene`s death was averted and the Xenos narrowly escaped alive. However, Bell obstructed efforts by the subjugation force against the monsters who had emerged on the surface - a fact which will not be erased. Bell faces cruel words and harsh stares throughout all of Orario.
Even worse, he receives information that the Xenos who came to the surface were unable to return to the dungeon and remain in hiding...
Source: Crunchyroll
